snippet: Sharron Angle, the Nevada Republican and Tea Party favorite, calls Rick Santorum "a strong fiscal and social conservative who stands on principles above politics."
abstract: Sharron Angle, the Nevada Republican and Tea Party favorite, calls Rick Santorum "a strong fiscal and social conservative who stands on principles above politics."
lead_paragraph: Sharron Angle, a Nevada Republican and Tea Party favorite, announced on Thursday that she was endorsing Rick Santorum for president. Ms. Angle issued a statement to the National Review:
